sentences.english: There was a moment of silence, then everyone but the Princess began to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 片刻寂靜之後，皇族貴胄們鬨堂大笑，除了公主。

sentences.english: Men of the sword had overthrown nobles and kings.
sentences.chinese: 手執利劍的人已經推翻了王室貴胄。

sentences.english: O king of Assyria, your shepherds slumber; your nobles lie down to rest.
sentences.chinese: 亞述王阿，你的牧人睡覺，你的貴胄安歇。

sentences.english: He said therefore, A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom, and to return.
sentences.chinese: 有一個貴胄往遠方去，要得國回來。

sentences.english: Gui Zhou calls in gold coin very grouchily, award gave a head a lackey.
sentences.chinese: 貴胄很不高興地將金幣收回，獎給了頭一個僕人。

sentences.english: We are young nobles, and have not yet worn our coronets.
sentences.chinese: 我們是年青的貴胄，尚未能戴上冠冕。
